publications.title: Venezuela: Governance and the Law
publications.abstract: Ineffective policies can persist, while potentially effective policies are often not adopted. The World Development Report 2017: Governance and the Law explores why some policies fail to achieve . Findings are drawn from open-access material and should be reviewed directly in the source publication page for full methodology. This item is included in the 2024-2026 deep-dive window and can be downloaded at no cost from the www.worldbank.org publication page.

publications.title: Venezuela: Human Development Report 2025
publications.abstract: Artificial intelligence (AI) has broken into a dizzying gallop. While AI feats grab headlines, they privilege technology in a make-believe vacuum, obscuring what really matters: peopleâ€™s choices. Findings are drawn from open-access material and should be reviewed directly in the source publication page for full methodology. This item is included in the 2024-2026 deep-dive window and can be downloaded at no cost from the hdr.undp.org publication page.
